item.description:
Biking is a great way to see Cape Cod and the Islands. Let me know if this is something that interests you at some point. We could either make it a day trip or spend the night at either hostels or B&Bs. Keep in mind that each location would be a day or even two. We can figure out exact dates if there's enough interest. Thanks!

Checkout Biking Cape Cod Online:
http://www.capecodbik...

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Bike Cape Cod, Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard?
